website_summaries.verdict: Appearing in its bare essentials, the low-top Mexico 66 Slip-On is the reawakened form of the classic Olympic runner which allows users to effortlessly slip in and fly. And though there are no shoelaces to tighten up the fit, a stretchy panel attached to the tongue hugs the foot and gives a snug fit on the instep.Comfort isn’t compromised since this sneaker is covered in smooth fabric. Most buyers are impressed with its carefree construction and multipurpose performance in a very reasonable price tag.
pros: Lots of reviewers love the lace-less presentation of this shoe as it projects a relaxed appearance
Those who own the original Mexico 66 with laces like the convenience of the slip-on feature of this revised version from the Onitsuka Tiger brand
The Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 Slip-On low-top sneaker is downright comfortable due to the choice of top materials and cushioning on the footbed
A perfect sneaker to wear during hot summer days as its fabric allows air to flow in and out of the shoe
The perforated footbed keeps the foot dry and fresh inside the shoe, many users have noted
Many buyers have described the shoe as surprisingly comfortable in spite of the lack of thick cushioning on the walls
A few say that the heel flap serves as pull tab and acts as a shoehorn for easy slip on
Apart from the original colorway of the Mexico 66, reviewers love that this sneaker comes in a wide array of colorways and textures
A lot of users have stated that the sneaker is Incredibly snug, in spite of its lace-less structure
Several users are enamored that this low-top provides significant arch support
cons: Some have observed that the colors run out fast
A couple of individuals have complained that the opening of this shoe felt tight and narrow
The canvas material picks up dirt quickly

customer_reviews.title: Slip-ons & Lace-ups are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have both the slip-ons and the lace-ups and i LOVE them both. they look awesome, have good support compared to similar style shoes, and slip on and off! Great for biking and summer days out but supportive enough for long walks or hikes. I wear an 8 (6.5M) in the lace-ups and 7.5 (6M) in slip-ons.
customer_reviews.author: Kate J.

customer_reviews.title: Onitsuka ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Onitsukas. This is my second pair and I'm definitely on the lookout for my next. The color I got was sold out everywhere online, even Onitsukas site and I've noticed colors tend to sell out so if you see something you like just get it. They're worth the money. I also love the laceless look, I like my pair with laces but these are so easy. Order a size down so they're snug though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: made with fabric not leather just to let you know
customer_reviews.text: I have the Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 with lace and that one was made in leather, this Mexico 66 slip-on is made with a cotton fabric, not a big deal for me, it is still very comfortable however like all my other Onitsuka Tigers I like to use a special insert for maximum comfort on the balls, arch, and heel of my feet. No need to hassle with shoe laces, so very convenient when you go to Japan where you are expected to take off your shoes when you enter someone's home. Oh wait a minute, Onitsuka is from Japan, what a coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the coolest sneakers I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they are instantly comfortable and look amazing. I took other people’s advice and ordered 1.5 sizes down, I’m normally a women’s 7 and got a 5.5. They are still a teeny tiny bit too big, but since they run narrow and my feet are kind of wide it ends up working - I think a 5 would have felt too narrow in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoes style.
customer_reviews.text: This are my third pair of shoes on this style. There is no arch support so they are only good for normal walking distance, if you are going to be walking for hours or on your feet then don't get this shoes. I should also mentioned that all my pairs had last me about 1.5 yrs with normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Li1976

customer_reviews.title: A bit bigger than expected, just as the other reviewers mention
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than expected, but feels pretty good. Add some inserts, and I have a bit more closure. Good materials used, and they are as vivid as pictured. Quite eye-catching, but not gaudy. My advice: Order a half size smaller than your actual size. The other reviews are indeed right, and you can always return it, if too small (though I don’t see any reviews whatsoever claiming they are ever a bit small. Virtually all the complaints are about them being bigger than expected).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Awful sneakers. The Onitsuka Ultimate 81's I usually buy had been out of stock for months, so I decided to try a different style. Both shoes are much too tight in the toe area, and the right shoe's sole doesn't extend all the way to the back of the shoe so with every step I feel the edge cutting into my heel. The right shoe also feels tighter around my toes than the left shoe. I had hoped wearing them for a few days would break them in a bit and make the fit around my toes more comfortable, but it hasn't. Not even a little. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly however it has been pretty comfortable for walking and hasn't caused any issues after ...
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish. I have wide feet and only about 70% of the sole is sitting on the shoe, the other 30% dangles out to the side. Surprisingly however it has been pretty comfortable for walking and hasn't caused any issues after several weeks of wear. (2 month) update: Docking a star because of durability concerns. After moderate wear (~2 times a week) the shoe has lost of its shape. I'm attributing most of the change to me having wider foot nevertheless the loss in shape is quite significant.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather--a 'looker'
customer_reviews.text: Nice fashion shoe--they always seem to run long--maybe half a size big. Sole wears fast, but the look great, fairly comfy, but not a long walking type shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RobAngel

customer_reviews.title: Please keep selling them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I admit that it was extreeeeemely difficult to get my hands on this onitsuka pair, I searched everywhere, and in amazon there was only like one pair and that's it, I strongly advise anyone to have patience if you like tigers, and also I urge Amazon to keep this brand in its portfolio, because they are very comfortable and basic shoes to use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: dplazas

customer_reviews.title: Great fit after a few wears.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. The sole is solid and comfortable. The canvas is nice and soft. The first wear was a bit tight, but I have a wide and tall foot. After a few times of wearing these shoes they stretched to a perfect fit. Don't let the tight first or second wear get you down. My shoe size is 13 and these fit true to size. Can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon & Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Otherwise very cute shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I live in these laceless Tigers, and always purchase online, so I know my size. For some reason these were about two sizes too small, despite the correct size written inside. Can't be bothered sending back, but disappointed. Hopefully it was a once-off error but maybe email seller to confirm sizing before buying?
customer_reviews.author: BGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit-comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They're great for when you're vacationing and need something easy to put on by simply slipping them on and going. The fit is perfect and always true to my real shoe size. I collect these sneakers because of their great fit and stylish looks. I just wish more colours and styles were available in Canada because I had to have these shoes sent to a friend who lives in the US. She was able to get them to me easily but it would be awesome to have them available to purchase here in Canada!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: I wear them everyday now
customer_reviews.text: I usually hate buying shoes online, I worry about getting the right fit. With this one I just went and looked at my last Nike shoes and got the same size number. It fits very nicely, and is true to size. I love the material, the colors, and the level of comfort. They're not the most comfortable shoes, but since I was looking for a slip-ons, I'm not complaining. The back folds nicely into the shoe and can fold out to be worn as a regular shoe as well without a trace of a crease.
customer_reviews.author: Yousef

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, top quality
customer_reviews.text: Switched from the usual brands like nike, puma, etc. like 2 years ago, those shoes won't last more than one year, but I'm just surprised about the quality of Onitsuka's instead, now I just buy this brand, I can put them together with my laundry in the washing machine and dryer almost weekly and shoes can handle it with no problem :)
customer_reviews.author: huachinango83

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit. Not too loose for not having laces.
customer_reviews.text: I love sneakers and am always looking for something unique. I was a little worried that the lack of laces would be an issue but it isn't at all. They fit snugly and are now my go-to sneakers for road trips, flying, and anything else where comfort is my top priority. They're very lightweight so that's another huge plus. I've had them for 6 months and they are still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: M_R

customer_reviews.title: Womens sizes are wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in my correct size (W9) as reviews say mostly true to size. It is too long in the toe. Went down half a size and it's still far too big. Sizing is way off as all my shoes are 8.5-9 so I'm wondering if I'm being sent men's sizes? Oh well, I'll go down another couple sizes and try again. At least they have free returns.
customer_reviews.author: caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing quality control
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit of the right shoe, but the left is considerably wider and slides all over :( they’re labeled as the same size, so it wasn’t a packaging mistake. Very disappointed, but not returning, as this was the only pair in my size. I will take them to a shoe repair shop in hopes that they can make the one shoe wearable. Especially bummed, because I wanted to wear them this weekend and even paid extra shipping to get them in time :(
customer_reviews.author: Suni

customer_reviews.title: Slip Em on and Get Moving!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Onitsuka Tigers! For someone who wears 8's for precisely fitted dress shoes and 8.5 for most sneaker and shoe brands (converse, babolat, etc), the 8.5 worked well. The arch support can be a bit uncomfortable at first for unfamiliarity, and even after a few weeks of use, I'm still not completely used to them, but the fit and mobility of these shoes is very good overall. They feel like an extension of my feet without excessive cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear 8 1/2-9 women’s. I have a wide-ish foot. I ordered a mans size 7. They FIT PERFECTLY. So happy. Only issue is they are canvas so the seams can be felt on the inside. Socks might be necessary to minimize this.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort just wish Asics would remove the lace hoops on this model.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite casual sneakers. These Asics Tiger are very comfortable. What I really like is how thin the sole is. You can feel the ground while wearing them which is great for posture. I wish they would remove the lace hoops so people don't ask you if you lost your laces. Besides that, I am a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. U. R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and minimal! They don’t breathe super well so you’ll probably want to wear socks in the summer with these. Otherwise these are great to wear all day and walking around. They don’t make weird insole noises like some sneakers so you can walk nice and quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: best for narrower feet
customer_reviews.text: i have flat feet. so to me, the soles are very narrow on these shoes. the narrow middle portion is about only 2.5 inches across. the arch support lands in the center of my feet, while the flat wide inner portions -where my arches should be- just hang outwards over both sides. this creates an odd sensation like I'd be more prone to rolling an ankle. that being said, they're still somehow very comfy. they've got a light flexible feeling without any pinching or rubbing spots. I can tell that if I had narrower feet, these would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.L. Yüan

customer_reviews.title: Onitsuka tiger never lets me down
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and cannot wear sneakers. I love the styles, the colors, the tradition, the quality, the fit, the arch support. For me mexico 66 works but if one style doesnt they have other styles that will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a shoe collector
customer_reviews.text: Love them, however my true size was a little wide and since the shoe is just clothe it isn't going to get any better. So if u have narrow feet u may, may want to try a half size smaller. Otherwise they r comfy and I have gotten a bunch of compliments. I own 6 pairs
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey, no comfort, 1/4" of sole
customer_reviews.text: So these look cool. But I've worn them twice in a few months, why they gotta charge 80 for a stitch of canvas and a 1/4" of sole..? Rip off really but they look cool, just don't expect to wear them daily
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, get's alot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: You can wear these shoes everywhere, the gym, hiking, strolling and they look great. They are laceless, but you can easily buy some laces and thread them in like I did no problem
customer_reviews.author: somard

customer_reviews.title: Bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these but there were several spots where there were obvious bad stitches that ruined the look. I returned them. I like the overall style and they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yum E.

customer_reviews.title: New favorites!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of the original lace up versions. Some time has passed since my last pair but I have always loved the style and fit of them and these did not disappoint. These slip on versions might run slightly larger than the originals however so I’d suggest going down a half size if you’re in between sizes. Product arrived on time and as expected! I love them and would definitely recommend if you’re considering getting a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Addison Ong

customer_reviews.title: A touch looser of a fit
customer_reviews.text: Id say they fit a touch looser than the laced ones but a 12 works for me in both. U can get sum mini laces for the too three holes to tighten em a bit. Then theyre pretty mich the origional ones. These just a touch more stylish i find
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Look great. Insoles are garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They look great and fit true to size. I subtracted 1 star because the insoles are straight garbage. The arch is high and in a very unnatural position (too far forward). I ripped out the insoles and replaced them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a women size 5.5 and it was huge on me! Normally, women U.S size 5.5 and corresponds to women 3.5 European. The shoe length states on the shoe is 22.5 inches but according to Amazon's size chart it's 9.4inches, which is really 23.9cm. Needless to say they are huge on me. Thankfully, it fits my mom so I don't need to return. I'm still dissapointed because I'm left with no shoes. Beware of sizes when you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Size Chart!
customer_reviews.text: Beware of the sizing if you're not familiar with Onitsuka size charts. There are 3 categories for adults. Unisex, Mens, Womens. If it's not indicated, it's Unisex. And Unisex is larger than Womens. I'm guessing Unisex is ALSO Mens size. It has a very confusing sizing chart, and it is such a hassle when you order the right number size but they give you the wrong actual size. Confusing ain't it? Update: 11/11/2015 They are very comfy and they break in almost instantly! I suggest you order a half size smaller. I wear a women's size 8, and I should have ordered a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Matc

customer_reviews.title: I have 2E wide feet so I was super bummed about them because I love Onitsuka Tiger
customer_reviews.text: Tight in the footbox. I have 2E wide feet so I was super bummed about them because I love Onitsuka Tiger. Alas, My feet were not made for this brand. If they ever do wider shoes, I'll jump back on the bandwagon so fast. Seemed to be comfortable for the two hours I wore them other than a tight toe.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Lund

customer_reviews.title: For those who take their shoes off in their homes and always ties/unties their shoelaces
customer_reviews.text: These are convenient if you need to step out quickly and don't have time (or patience) to tie your shoelaces. Just slip these on and you're good to go. They are also stylish and can be worn for smart-casual attire. These sneakers are meant for dry and warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: KD637

customer_reviews.title: Buy direct, not from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I think I received a counterfeit pair. They're still cute but they look cheaply made. Not worth $100.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for my pupose
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes was looking for a slip on sneaker that was stylish not old people walking shoes these fit the bill. Only complaint is they seem to get dirty really fast they say not to wash them so I'm going to try that but overall pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Can't Have Too Many Onitsuka Tigers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm crazy for these shoes -- I have (or have had) a total of 12 pair of them, both unlaced and laced, over the last several years, and worn them, literally, around the world. The white/white do, of course, soil easily, and at some point they need to be replaced (at least, if you're going to wear them for something other than gardening). Ergo, I bought these -- and love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Good look... order a 1/2 size down
customer_reviews.text: Got these a few days ago. I like them. They look great. They're very light. The elastic keeps the slip-on snug. I usually wear an 11.5 US, but the 11 ended up fitting the best. We'll see how durable the bottom of the soles (which are somewhat squashy (but not too squashy) rubber) are.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. I also have some Ultimate 81s and these ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I also have some Ultimate 81s and these fit as perfectly and comfortably as those. Some people are saying to get a size larger, but I have the same size for these, my Ultimate 81s, and a bunch of New Balances. They have a small arch support built into them, which is perfect for me since I need the support. They're also light and airy, so they'll be good for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Richman

customer_reviews.title: Timeless....
customer_reviews.text: These have a slight arch support so my feet don’t die after a day of wearing them which is surprising for these types of shoes. These are just classic and I get compliments on them all the time. TIMELESS
customer_reviews.author: gp

customer_reviews.title: Level of comfort unmatchable stop wasting money on other things
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s unbelievable that the level of comfort these shoes can provide I have a lot of other sports and casual shoes like Nike fly knight, adidas ultra boost, Cole Hann ZeroGrand, Caterpillar, Converse, But no one beats it you can wear whole day long & even sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal Khan

customer_reviews.title: Where has this shoe been all my life??!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this shoe been all my life??!! The fit is perfect and the minimalistic design bodes very well with anything. Very comfortable and fit just right. I usually wear a 12.5 in sneakers and could have gone for 12 or 12.5 in this one. I would suggest this shoe to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great, runs a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest you order a half size smaller. I normally wear a size 12 and for these Tiger slip-on I had to order an 11.5. I can wear them with or without socks and they are very light and comfortable. The color combo of the white canvas sneaker with the red and blue stripes looks great. The shoes fit securely on your feet without feeling loose or restrictive. I wore them all weekend and they were great for all the walking I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Sync

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and comfortable. I love the way they look with tights. Definitely size down I wear an 8.5, size 8 fits perfectly. Waiting for more color to become available.
customer_reviews.author: Aspire to be tidy

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Onitsuka Tigers and they are already my new favorite shoe. They are comfortable and well-made with great colors. I ordered my usual size (M-10) and they fit perfectly. Note that they may be slightly too loose if you wear your shoes without socks or very thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS BIGGER
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the dark color these ones look and feel bigger on my feet. So it is better if tried on first.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like a normal Asics shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you have any foot issues, these shoes will not work for you. I'm a long-time Asics wearer, and these have a very narrow heal, and very little padding. They look fine and fit fine, but these will not be good for anyone with foot issues such as plantar facsiitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love My Tigers
customer_reviews.text: I Love My Tigers. This is the only brand of shoe that I can buy online without having to try them on in person. I have a thick/wide foot and the Japanese know how to design shoes. I am so grateful for Asics Tiger Onitsuka because most shoe manufacturers run very narrow. Asics is one of the few shoe companies that run wide. I wear these shoes all the time. They look great and are super comfortable. I recommend them to anyone who wants a comfortable shoe. I am actually a 11.5 E/2E and buy the 12 M and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy 0.5-1 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to run in, and a half size smaller than my regular fit felt just a bit too loose. If you're getting these shoes because you like the style than a half size below would probably be your best option, but if you plan on running with them I would recommend going a full size down. It does feel a little tight but I prefer that over the feeling that my shoe could fall off when training.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Tlatenchi

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These tigers were a little looser than I expected but I actually prefer them that way. They are true to Tigers and very special to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Compagnino

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, stylish, soft . . . .
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfortable, no laces to tie. Perfect for when you feel lazy but can’t go barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: DRAKE A COLLEY

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these shoes for years. I love that they are slip-on laceless and I love that they are machine washable so they can stay looking great for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. Not really a running shoe great for lazy days or after working out. Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes- have owned several pairs but this is the only version I’ve seen with a furry lining. Comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Seidman

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great. The only issue is the size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. The only issue is the size. Like other people have said, they are a half size bigger than what you want. I wanted to take their advice but the color I wanted wasn't available in a half size smaller so I decided to go for it. It is a little bigger but the shoe fits, its no big deal, so just make sure to order a half size lower. As far as how they look, they look exactly like I expected, super nice. They are easy to put on and take off and are comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but pretty much can only be used ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but pretty much can only be used indoors as the canvas picks up dirt very easily. I pretty much was these shoes after I wear them a few times. I don't expect them to last very long. Nylon and PU coated leather would have been a much better choice in materials for this shoe. See what Nike is up to with their "Internationalist" shoes for an example of great materials.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsy Guy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite slip-on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on, classic good looks, and well fitting (finding men’s shoes in 12.5 is not easy): what’s not to like? Yes, the footbed is a bit flat and no, these are not the shoes for playing sports, but as a lightweight, casual shoe they’re tough to beat. Get a pair and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Davenport

customer_reviews.title: My fave
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Obviously liked them enough to buy again, just be aware that these run slightly larger than expected. I normally wear a 7.5 in women, and while the sizing chart did suggest a sz 6 (uni) I went with the 5.5. Very glad I did because my feet slip in like hands in a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Then3ss

customer_reviews.title: My husband is particular with his kicks and prefers slip ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is particular with his kicks and prefers slip ons to lace ups. He looooves these due to the old school design, but also because they are downright comfy. Sizing is normal and he took his usual size.
customer_reviews.author: coffee please

customer_reviews.title: Size is right and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my husband. It is came with exactly right size. These shoes are exactly the same as pictures. The color is very pretty and my husband love it.
customer_reviews.author: jbrown117

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes just wide
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but they are definitely wider that I would have expected. I still liked them enough to keep even though they are pretty loose on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like onitsuka tiger serrano. I need half size down for this shoes (9) than serrano(9.5). This is very comfortable and easy to on/off.
customer_reviews.author: 321go

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these shoes look and wear. Considering getting a different color. Need insoles so rec ordering a size up.
customer_reviews.author: JS0027

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced
customer_reviews.text: Entire upper constructed of canvas....Flimsy at best with no functional mid sole. A steep price for a logo and nostalgia attached to a flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: My second skin down on the feets😊
customer_reviews.text: Its a dream shoe if you know what it feel like wearing a shoe and still feei g as if you are running and walking bare feet.You won’t realize the weight of this shoe and they feel like your second skin.
customer_reviews.author: inks282

customer_reviews.title: Bright white in spite of color being called "grey"
customer_reviews.text: "Vaporous grey" is actually pretty bright white, especially if you're wearing them with dark jeans (denim blue or grey).
customer_reviews.author: brnt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on shoe. Flat and thin.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect slip on shoe. It's flat and the sole is thin. Washes in washing machine without troubles or wear off. So good I had to get it again after my first pair wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Palomares

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: A classic design and fits well. I just love the look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: MDL

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't come with laces
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with laces.. I should have known by the word "slip-on" but my other Mexico 66s came with laces so I thought these would too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastical comfortable classic shoes
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. These are the shoes for a long day on your feet. These are my second pair of tiger shoes and I can’t say enough great things.
customer_reviews.author: Butner Fam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap canvas and check sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! I have many pairs of Tigers but these slip-ons are really cheaply made. First, as everyone mentions, these are unisex sizes and the description doesn't mention that, so the ones I ordered were a size and a half too big. Next, the description says they are synthetic, which I thought meant synthetic leather, but they are CANVAS. You can't determine that from the image. Big fail, Amazon! Poor description all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great casual sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call them running shoes due to no laced But as casual easy to wear and very comfortable sport shoes they are excellent Fit is perfect so but your normal size I love them and have several pairs in different colors
customer_reviews.author: Sixgun

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, looked the way it was supposed to look, and the right size. I wear a 8 1/2 and the shoe was true to that fitting. Feels great, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sneakers - I get complimented all the time
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sneakers. I wear them daily and they are still in great shape. They don't have laces so they are super easy to slip on and off. People are always asking me about them or taking pictures so they can find them online. I wear a size 6.5 and ordered these two sizes down (men's 4.5) and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Flexible for a wide foot, but work for narrow feet too.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are wide and this material is perfectly flexible to allow for the width. I usually have to order a half size too big , which makes the toes loose, but these fit very nicely. I have a friend who has narrow feet and he says they fit him well also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Laceless Onitsuka's!
customer_reviews.text: Love the laceless, was concerned they would be too loose, but the are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sneaker! Wish I could have one of each color. It’s hard to choose from so many nice ones. Good quality, comfortable, perfect fit, awesome design.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, wish they had laces. I did listen to the reviews and ordered a half size smaller and it was a wise choice, they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Lomax

customer_reviews.title: onitsuka Mexico 66
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this shoe!!! Fits great I'm a size 7.5 womans shoe .... I read reviews about sizing down and I got a Mens size 5. I thought it might've been too small but NOPE to my surprise its perfect not tight at all. Just right and comfortable. Hope this helps. Beyond happy right now
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Onitsuka!!! Amazing Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Onitsuka Tigers Mexico 66. I absolutely love these shoes, they are light, stylish, and fits perfect. I am ordering a pair for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: I like the style but I don't think I'll buy shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the style but I don't think I'll buy shoes again that don't tie. They are just too lose around my ankle and my foot slides, making them uncomfortable for a lot of walking or standing.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Yamazaki

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish, and durable. I've been buying ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, stylish, and durable. I've been buying Onitsuka Tiger shoes for about 10 years and I have yet to regret a single pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Great for lazy person like me
customer_reviews.text: I really like the slip on Mexico 66, it’s comfortable, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Not sure they will last long if you're wearing them everyday, but still a great looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are the most comfortable sneakers I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable sneakers I've ever owned. They stay on the feet with no slipping without being tight. I did buy a half size down as per the other reviews and they are a perfect fit. I normally wear 7.5 US women size, ordered 5.5 unisex.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Could have afforded a 1/2 size down but no problems. Love the shoes. Arrived quick and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brant McCullough

customer_reviews.title: good city shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great casual shoes for getting around town. You won't be able to do anything athletic in them, even running to catch the bus would be a stretch, but they are comfy and good for walking. They fit more like slippers than shoes, in that the elastic closure is not very tight, making it easy to get in and out but providing a relatively loose fit
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sneakers to wear my second half of pregnancy and have pretty much been wearing them every day. Love how they look and the off-white color. Being slip-ons is perfect for this stage of pregnancy too. Bought a half size up to accommodate swelling feet and worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: I always wear that i was going outside this is my best shoes collection.
customer_reviews.author: Zohaib Momin

customer_reviews.title: Too big not good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these they do not fit to size. Very clumsy & big. Two previous pairs from different seller last year fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and get compliments every time I wear them! I put an insole in to help. A little flat but overall, great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely and great quality, please be aware for this brand, on the shoe label it will say "US Size 6" when it's US Size 7.5
customer_reviews.author: meifei soo

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers especially this model without laces
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers especially this model without laces. Just slip it on and you're ready to go. Just hope there were more colors. I love the navy blue I bought. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tereebe

customer_reviews.title: Underrated kicks
customer_reviews.text: Slippers or sneakers I wear either way. Great fit and no laces to mess with, these are my huckleberry
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Stylish n comfortable shoes. I wear it almost everyday
customer_reviews.text: Stylish n comfortable shoes.I wear it almost everyday.But you should pay extra attention to the shoes size.I think it is designed for the men.So I returned the original shoes for the smaller one.For example,my shoes size usually 7M or 7W,I choose 5M.Hopefully it will helpful for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: love them, but confusing size chart for women
customer_reviews.text: They are nice design and light. I am a woman and usually wear size 6.5. The size 5 fits me perfectly. If you have wide feet, you might feel tight. Since the size options are for men, to find women's size, check your European size on women's size chart first. Then find it on men's size chart. For example, my size, US 6.5, is Europe size 37.5 on women's size. Europe size 37.5 is US men's size 5. I love these black shoes, but if the holes are black that would be perfect. ( they are silver.)
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very light and comfortable and feel almost as comfortable as being bare foot. They look amazing, too!
customer_reviews.author: Alassi1369

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes evah
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes evah! I've been wearing Onitsuka Tigers for decades and the Mexico 66 slip-on is the Cadillac of slip-ons. I walk a lot in the city and these shoes really hold up. I was so happy that this brand came out with slip-on style a because Vans suck--too much rubber, no style, and they wear down quick. I would recommend Onitsuka Tigers to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, thin material from previous shoes the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Onitsuka Tiger - Unisex-Adult Mexico 66 Slip-On Shoes, 5.5 UK, Birch/Orange
product_meta.description: International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
feature_bullets: Laceless construction with metallic eyelets detail.
Canvas lining and a perforated, cushioned footbed for all-day comfort.

Suede T-toe overlay for extra protection. Rubber toe bumper for protection. Flip top heel flap for a personalized look. Low-profile, two-toned EVA midsole for added cushioning and low-to-the-ground fit and feel. Rubber outsole for grip. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size Men's 9.5, Women's 11, width Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
